Articles.Content: Just wondering are there any mods out there which add mecha legs to the game? just thinking it would be an interesting alternative to wheels? I think i saw a mod that gives you tank treads to use but i'd like to be able to create a 2,4,6 or 8 legged mech to crawl around on the mun.
You could try damned robotics, you may need to do some tweaking to get them to work this way though
Infernal Robotic is the mod you're looking for.

I do have a topic on this, if you are interested.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63509-Fully-Functional-Bipedal-Mech
Cool, i'll have a go at building one.
